description: a(n)=p+q, where n=p-q and p, q, p+q are in A005836 (integers written without 2 in base 3).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Z. Sunic, Tree morphisms, transducers and integer sequences
prog: (Haskell)a060374 n = f $ dropWhile (< n) a005836_list where   f (p:ps) | a039966 (p-n) == 1 && a039966 (2*p-n) == 1 = 2*p - n            | otherwise                                  = f ps-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 29 2011
author: Claude Lenormand (claude.lenormand(AT)free.fr), Apr 02 2001
extensions: Definition clarified by Zoran Sunik (sunik(AT)math.tamu.edu), Feb 16 2006
